author: Ktn News
title: Inspector General Boinnet puts drug lords on notice - VIDEO | The Standard
text:
Checkpoint / 15 hours ago [VIDEO] Inspector General Boinnet puts drug lords on notice 
The war on illegal drugs in Kenya has been long and winding. Lately, it is seemingly taking a political dimension even as the governments of Kenya and the United States as well as the European union say they have their eyes trained on certain persons of interest. Related Videos
